message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

The paper deals with the problem of automatically learning the relevance of product reviews to specific queries. This involves natural language processing, machine learning, and information retrieval techniques, which are all relevant to the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper uses a mixture-of-experts-type framework, which is a common approach in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The relevance function that is learned is based on the reviews themselves, which involves analyzing and understanding natural language text (cs.CL). Finally, the paper deals with customer reviews, which are a form of user-generated content, and the problem of addressing complex and subjective queries, which are relevant to the sub-category of Cybersecurity (cs.CY).
